p: Therapeutic benefits may be gained by reinforcing GICs with additional antibacterial agents. Studies have been focusing on release or slow release of antibacterial agents such as antibiotics, zinc ions, silver ions, iodine, and most commonly chlorhexidine that is considered the gold standard for antibacterial applications. Several in vitro studies confirmed the enhancement of the biological properties of GIC when being incorporated with CHX [ 6â€“ 8].
